title: FLOAT.K8s - Playful Hallucination Canvas
description: An experimental platform combining Kubernetes (K8s) concepts with interactive visual hallucinations, creating a playful canvas where infrastructure management meets generative art.

fullDescription.content: FLOAT.K8s - Playful Hallucination Canvas is an experimental platform combining Kubernetes (K8s) concepts with interactive visual hallucinations. It creates a playful canvas where infrastructure management meets generative art, visualizing complex cognitive structures as dynamic, evolving patterns.
Explore the evolution from chaotic play to FLOAT.K8s, a framework for managing meta-meta cognitive overwhelm

The Playful Hallucination Canvas represents a conceptual framework that maps the relationships between different cognitive structures and technological concepts. At its core is FLOAT.K8s, a metaphorical extension of Kubernetes that manages not containers, but cognitive processes and meta-cognitive structures.
The canvas visualizes several key concepts:

items.title: FLOAT.K8s
items.content: The central framework represented as a hexagon, managing meta-cognitive processes

items.content: Representing "LLMs amplifying cognitive overload and reinforcing existing thought patterns"
